https://i.4cdn.org/a/1506508880063.webm

Hm, this seems like a pretty cheap ending. Sure it's clever and all (and I absolutely prefer it to what Mr. AngryZombie88 was suggesting) but it's too general an excuse I think. Consider this scenario: you have your generic harem setup, except the main guy is a serial killer who rapes and then murders his harem members and is implied to eat their remains. It's pretty edgy right? Makes my stomach churn a little just thinking about it, but the point is that just sticking a "it was all a dream" on the end of it doesn't diminish the fact that /the violent killing of these women is added into the story alongside sex/. Dunno, just seems a bit weird to me...

Though on a more uplifting note, the art in this hentai is absolutely stellar!
We get hentai and she gets to walk away unraped.
